title: CAT Groovy Men Watch, 44.5 mm case, Polycarbonate case, Silicone Strap
description: Caterpillar develops innovative and highly technological products. The same principles apply to the stylish Cat timekeeping equipment products for active people. Constructed from the highest quality materials, Cat watches are developed to meet stringent requirements, without compromises. Each Cat watch encompasses cutting edge design and high functionality to offer a solid performance in a variety of active situations. Cat watches offer a fitting timekeeper for the adventurous person, with great emphasis being attached to the casual and powerful design of the watch and the philosophy behind the Cat brand.
